title: Latest update changed some features
text:
I love telegram, but the devs like to change things that aren’t broken. They changed the way you send photos, and now can’t view your folders in camera roll. 

Also when will you guys remove notifying people when you make a telegram? I don’t want everybody who has my phone number to know how to reach me here.

title: The new version doesn’t work!
text: Just tried to download the latest update of the app and it doesn’t work! When I tap the app, it doesn’t open. It gets shut down. And the update icon on the app logo does not disappear! As if it hasn’t been updated! The new version must have bugs.

title: My Thoughts on Telegram
text: I kind of like this App. But however maybe small ideas can make telegram better. Maybe add another language interface like Japanese. I have a Japanese who’s from Japan and there’s no Japanese. And second I wished there was a forgot Password because I most of the time have a feeling of forgetting my password. And also there are some people I don’t know who showed up out of know where. That could be fixed.

title: Phenomenal App
text:
This is by far my favorite social app and I hope it continues to improve. 

I hope in the future that we can finally make Paid Channels or Paid Groups (without bots) that way we can have the option to charge members a subscription fee to access our content

Make it happen!

title: Need to add pin (place-marker) ability
text:
If you start jumping around in comments following reply threads, it’s nearly impossible to go back to where you were without accidentally going to the end of the comments and having to search for where you started jumping.
Need the ability to be able to drop a pin to mark spots to come back to.

title: Feature request
text:
I love this app with its great features. I use it to communicate with family and friends and i subscribe to useful channels.
Beside these features i hope to add the ability to add a custom sound notification other than those existing in the app like signal. This is possible by files app in the iPhone.
Also i hope to add an emergency feature to notify the user (like ping in the bbm and nudge in windows live messenger).

title: Something wrong
text: I can’t imagine my life without telegram..I’m use it from long long time..but there is something bothers me lately..when I’m trying to clear caches telegram takes long time to calculating caches size..I keep waiting for it to complete the calculation to free more space but it keep loading more and more..what can I do ..?

title: Would be better without Apple’s censorship.
text: Apple will block certain chats or people for some of the most abstract and asinine reasons. My suggestion will be to use the web browser version to avoid this, unfortunately you will lose some functionality. Or you can download their desktop application from their website.

title: Suggesting as a user
text:
About the half of Iranian users information has been released by a group in internet.
Some of your users have more than three accounts for any kind of reasons, I think it’s better to bring a way to your app that users be able to have more than three , Or you yourself introduce some apps which you have trust .

title: Amazing
text: Telegram is an amazing app. I just found one bug. It takes about a minute for a message to pop up on an iPhone lock screen if the app is not opened on the phone. WhatsApp and fb messenger show up immediately even if the app is closed. Not the biggest deal but other than everything else is perfect with the app. I wished more people used it.

title: Favourite Messaging App
text: Would like to support the app because it deserves it but do not use enough to justify the subscription price. If you making mad money Telegram, then disregard but if want more pay customers, please drop annual price.  Other than that, wifi calling, messaging and voice messaging work perfekt.

title: Crappy app.
text: I’ve been using this app for more than a year now and it seemed decent enough. About 4 months or so ago all the sudden my friends pfps would disappear and if I tried to se when they were on, it always said “last seen a long time ago”. None of my texts would come in. The only way to SOMETIMES fix it is by deleting the app and redownloading it. This is obnoxious and I don’t even know how many times I deleted this app and redownloaded it but it’s a trashy app and I don’t recommend.

title: bug crash report
text: After updating to ios 15.4.1 it crashes when some other apps are open. for example when pdf expert is open telegram doesn’t open and crashes and ipad/ios goes to home screen. Also this occurs when there is no other app opened.

title: Can’t comment on posts when in tag search results
text:
This is a major bummer - if you search a tag, the posts that come up are not editable or comment-able. 

There’s no way to trace a conversation in larger chats - the @ symbol is unrecoverable once the app thinks you saw something. No way to go back but to search or scroll. Any plans to make conversations easier to rewind?

title: Good and fun alternative to some other messaging platforms
text: Telegram is a good and fun alternative to some other messaging platforms.  You are not a product.  I love the whacky and fun animated meme characters.  I like that I can text and speak to someone without revealing my phone number (option to hide it).  Its also fast and very responsive.

title: Great app overall-Just one minor issue
text: I use this app for work and love it. The only thing that bugs me is the fact that I get notifications every time someone joins Telegram. It makes it seem like I have new messages when really it’s just a notification for someone joining Telegram. There is a setting to turn off notifications when someone joins telegram, but the app notifications are still there.

title: Inconsistent sync contacts
text:
I wondering for an option called, sync contacts, it means phone and telegram contacts must be sync together, but when you create new contact in your phonebook (Contacts) it appears in telegram, but if you remove a contact it still in telegram and you need goto settings and delete all sync contacts and sync it again, if this behavior is as design change the menu name to copy contacts not SYNC!

⚠️It is not good idea to don’t do sync, because your privacy settings not effected to the deleted contacts ⚠️
Thanks

title: Wonderful
text: This application in vary useful,when you use it,you can access to every thing like photoes,videos,the voice and different types of stickers,you can make a albums of your photoes in your profile and the other advantage in that you Can find in your massges the old item that you maybe deleted from your phone.

title: Not many would get what Telegram actually does
text:
The thing about Telegram is, if you’re not living in a country where free information is restricted, truth is twisted, anything said against the establishment could get you arrested, then you won’t fully appreciate this app and its impact on your life. 

Like, the Telegram channels get you easy access to all the information the government is trying to keep from you, and the security of your chats are so high that it has brought those governments to threats of blocking the app. 

But if you’re using Telegram in a free country just to send simple, non-life threatening messages to friends and family, then it’s just an okay app. 

Otherwise, Telegram is a lifesaver.

title: Awesome!
text: I’ve used telegram for years and it’s my only messaging platform. I even have premium! Is absolutely worth converting to if you are considering it. Their iPad support is wonky but not wonky enough to unusable! And the stickers! They’re free unlike Discord. If they manage to be gamer friendly in the same way they’ll overtake discord for sure

title: The greatest messenger ever existed!
text: I am never going to use anything accept Telegram in this life. I am in love with the app and it’s features. However, there is only one suggestion that would make it perfect: birthday notifications. I would love to see birthdays of my friends on TG and it would make everyone’s life much easier. Great job, guys!!

title: Doesn’t work
text: I downloaded the app and it won’t let me sync my contacts. Automatically brings me to my iPhone settings for the app and the enable contacts “button” doesn’t even show up. Siri and three other things show up but no contact enable button shows up. I’ve reset/updated my phone, cleared the data in the app itself, deleted the app, etc. and nothing seems to be working. Not sure if it’s an issue on the app or my phone but it’s useless. Can’t send a message without syncing contacts first.

title: Great for texting, horrible for calling
text: Telegram is great for texting, but for calling it leaves a lot to be desired. It randomly disconnects the call when locking the phone, sometimes I can lock my phone without it disconnecting, other times it disconnects and I have to redial. When in group calls, it randomly kicks me out of the call unless I have the app open on the screen (not in the background) or if I lock my phone. It’s infuriating. I don’t recommend Telegram for calling.

title: It Got Much Worse...
text:
I always respected and liked Telegram and its app, but recently it got much worse. A lot of problems with call connection and voice in calls. VK and WhatsApp always were a cr*p for me, but now I must switch to them if it's about calls and connection. I'm very upset and I hope Durov and CO will find a solution and make Telegram great again. 

My location is South of Russia, so the problem could be in my location because of recent events. I wish Telegram a good fortune, your app in my ❤️

title: I have no idea how this app has 4 stars
text: There is no support to contact when you have an issue, no way to reset your password if you forget your log in, and you can’t immediately delete your account. I have someone hacking into my accounts and I really don’t want my private conversations looked at and leaked or people trying to message other people under my name. There is absolutely no support to contact and no measures put in place to keep your accountable secure and protected. This app needs to be taken off of the App Store

title: Overly Sexualized Stickers!
text: I’ve been using this app for so long and don’t get me wrong it’s simply awesome, BUT when it comes to the stickers the app offers they’re almost ALL obscene to the point that it’s embarrassing! It’s such an irony since the app itself actively blocks any pornographic content but when it comes to its stickers…the female ones are too Sexualized! And there’s one obscene one among all packs! I can’t even describe them here!! it makes no sense since many families and friends use it as a social app not another type of app yet it offers such stickers…

title: Glassy stickers
text: I have been using Telegram for several years and I was always satisfied, but in the last update, my stickers become glassy and dim to the point that I can't even see them clearly, and I don't know if it's a bug or something else I hope it will be fixed in the new update or you will give me a solution so that I can fix it

title: Last seen function
text: Everything has been great with the updates, better features, emoji’s and all.  But now the last seen at the top has changed to just last seen recently.  Why are the time stamps gone.  I think this was one of the better features of this app.  It would be great to have that back.  Thank you!

title: Privacy issue
text: I really would give you 5 stars review , but lately I discovered that telegram share some private things with public without my permission !!, to be more specific I’m talking about “ groups in common “ , just notice that if any person in a common group clicked on my name , the telegram gives the group in common !! , it’s really annoying and violates my privacy ! , there’s sensitive information I don’t want to share with any one , so please do something about it .

title: Amazing
text:
Hi, guys! This is the best messenger in the world. I really like spending time in groups and chats.

I have an idea for improving usability. Can you give us the option to split the chat tab into two? I want to keep all my groups and chats(multi-user) separate from chats with my friends. This will help me structure everything.

Thank you for your time!

title: Arabic font problem
text:
Dears,
  It is too clear that this application is one of the best social media applications, but when update our ios to the 11th we have a problem with Arabic font, especially with texts copied from other applications, it becomes messy and some times words interfered with each other, so we want your kind support about this issue. 

REGARDS

title: I have a problem
text: Not gonna lie telegram is amazing and the video call feature is awesome and all .... but after I updated the app it won't open I don't know why I tried so many times to open it and deleted it and installed it again but nothing changed still doesn't open does anyone experienced the same thing??? 😭😭

title: App crashes
text:
I’m currently using the ios 17.0.1 and the latest telegram version, when i try to use proxy or connect to the vpn, the telegram app crashes and it won’t work in anyway, i tried deleting and reinstalling my telegram app and it didn’t work…
Please fix this issue as soon as possible…. 🙏

title: Telegram doesn’t work
text:
After updating telegram it’s stopped working and comes out of telegram before even showing something only white screen and comes back to main screen
It’s because of my active proxy when I turn off the proxy that I’m using it’s works but with the second I activate the proxy it’s shot me out and I can’t open telegram app and only white screen sometimes I got lucky and it shows something but just for a second that is please help me or give a update for fixing this bug please fix this

title: Far more than just a messenger
text: This app is like mini internet in itself, in a very good way, like back in the early 2000s when it was still free and fairly unrestricted. Telegram is HUGE and you can simply use it as a messenger too. My only gripe is that they do not know how to do calls, that part works poorly.

title: Nice update
text: But I think there’s more to do.. I find it hard to find what I downloaded in a channel of about thousands of medias and files, I have to start looking or try remember the name of the file before I can find them.. there should be a box where things download are stored and easily to find

title: Family Share
text:
Awesome you gave us a yearly discount of 40%. Thank you. 🙏 

Two things that keep me from going premium:

1. Family Share enabled so we can share subscriptions with other members of the household. 
2. A single subscription that covers multiple Telegram accounts. Some of us have more than one account, like for personal and work. 

Is it really reasonable to ask us to subscribe to the premium subscription for each account? 

If one subscription covers each of our Telegram accounts and enables family share I’m sure you will have a lot more premium subscribers. 

For your consideration …

title: So close.
text:
Telegram used to be one of the best messengers. Period. Now I can’t say that for certain. 

In recent updates, they have been integrating blockchain tech (Yikes.) They’ve been seen “reclaiming” claimed usernames to sell on the chain. But that’s not the worst part, the worst part is (after a VERY short research session) that they have been sued by the SEC. Fragment isn’t available in the US because of this. (yay!) This is a huge red flag, i’d rather them be using Ethereum than this. Mega yikes.

title: Telegram problem
text: Hi I am writing this review because with the last update my telegram gifs are deleted and telegram gotta change its broke up suddenly and stops even when i am using it so I had to reset all the phone thinking the problem in the phone but not the app update is worse than last version . Hope you will fix the problem and get back the gifs . Don't know if its just happened with me but it's getting worse and not worked that each time I need it cancelled every thing and broke my files

title: Lack of user support
text:
I emailed telegram many times! I was asking them about a user problem that lead my account into a deleted account without my permisson, but I recieved nothing in months.
Neither my telegram ID nor any answer.

The other problem is Fragment system!
They sell deleted account ID's and that is what I call telegram down fall!

Last problem:
When I block someone they will be added to block list automaticly and while my list is filled with hundreds of spam bots there isn't a way to clear the list.
Add some features for clearing block list without unblocking them.

Dear Leading Team, please show some respect to users. Telegram needs a huge support team.

title: Help please 😑
text:
Hello
 Why in Telegram settings
 Privacy section
 Groups and channels
 There is only the "All" option and the "My contacts" option !?
 Why is there no "nobody" option ??? !!!
 Please respect our rights and provide the conditions for our well-being in Telegram!
 We are so tired of being added to groups and channels without our permission and consent !!
 Please add the "Nobody" option to this section so that we can use Telegram safely and without interruption by selecting this option.
 Thank you in advance for this cooperation and thank you to the hard-working team of Telegram for this useful and practical software that created a great change in the world.

title: App doesn’t open
text:
I have had the app on my iPhone and it was working OK but since yesterday it just doesn’t open (Iran). I don’t know what might be the problem. I deleted the app and reinstalled it but again after couple of hours it stopped working.
Any idea on how to fix this?

title: The application does not open with proxy
text:
Hello, I work with Telegram from Iran
The Telegram application is filtered in Iran and I always use it with a proxy, but after the update a few days ago, you all faced the problem of entering the app in Iran and it only opens with a filter breaker. Thank you for following up and fixing the problem soon.

title: STORY UPDATE
text: Hello telegram I have to give you a 5 star for your top notch job with telegram these past years of my usage but there’s something lacking which is a story update, telegram is just too quiet without a story where you can see what your other “telegramers”🤭 are up to. Please consider to have this done for us thanks 🙏🏻

title: Overall great app
text: I like everything about this app. The only thing I recommend for improvement is being able to edit messages without a time frame while also adding the ability to see previously edited messages. Also being able to see when the recipients viewed the message is a big plus. Great app and I have no cons to express :)

title: PLEASE REMOVE ADULT CONTENT FROM THE STICKERS
text:
Loved the creative stickers, but was disgusted to see dirty adult content. In this age of smartphones, don't you realize children are also exposed to such content?

25th Sept. 2022 UPDATE- ADDITION TO REVIEW :-
Good for nothing rascals. Had tried to upload huge videos and after completion of uploading they get cancelled and once again start from the beginning. At least if uploading huge files isn't supported, they should mention it instead of just rejecting without a word. People would think it was just an error and would repeatedly try.

title: About quick reactions and double tab
text:
Hiiii 
I just wanted to say it would be really nice if you could disable the double tab in quick reactions. 
Cuz some people have tendency to read their messaged with significant others and it gets embarrassing when they like one message out of no where!!! CUZ IT LITERALLY SENDS THEM THE NOTIFICATION!!!! 😭😭😭💔💔💔💔

title: Greatest app I have
text: 5 Star having said that I have some ideas to make this app more unique like auto Translator option icon. I’m currently looking into the hidden channels getting first hand information from Ukraine advances but it’s Russian so I have to copy and paste to see in google translation. Love the app high expectations

title: Lovely app just a recent bug
text:
I love this app 😍 just wanted to report a couple of problems with the new update.
1.After updating the app messages are shown incomplete on my device. I cant see the end of sentences(Both sent msg and received msg) 
2.i wanted to delete my profile pic to add new ones. After deleting a pic from my profile the app suddenly stopped and i had to start it over for several times.

title: iPad version issues
text: Previous version was totally okay but In new update when you open the app the screen will be invent then you must rotate a few time to back to the normal. Also when you hold a massage to see the options , comping options are not in the right place or won't respond to the tap. Need to be fix...
